Turn Plain Text Into Production-Ready Apps

No templates. No boilerplate. Just full-stack code, zipped and ready.

optimuscode.io

Try a Demo BuildExplore Features
const app = optimusCode.generate({
  type: "task-manager",
  features: ["auth", "kanban"],
  techStack: "react-node-supabase"
});
// Generated in 45 seconds
downloadZip("task-flow-app.zip");

The Future of Web Development

OptimusCode eliminates boilerplate and generates complete, production-ready applications from a simple text description.

Auto-Zipped Output

Get your entire project bundled as a downloadable .zip file, ready to use.

Auth + DB Included

Every app comes with authentication and database built-in.

Adaptable Tech Stack

Comprehensive tech stack customized to your project needs.

No Templates

Fully custom code generation based on your specific requirements.

One-Prompt Deploy

From concept to code with just a single text prompt.

AI-Powered Analysis

Advanced AI understands your project needs and builds accordingly.

How It Works

From text prompt to complete application in five simple steps.

Input

Describe your app in plain text

Plan

AI analyzes requirements

Generate

Code is created & tested

Package

Files bundled together

Download

Get your ready-to-use app
